name: Undeadcore (Atmosaero)
description:
Undeadcore is a Co-Op survival-horror(4vs1) where one player takes on the role of the Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors.

Only local multiplayer

Game development will continue.

Here is a small list of what is coming: 

New Maps;

New Characters;

New Main Menu UI! 

Voice chat and other means of communication;

More interactions;
